entry.title: LKE-2 (ember leg warmers)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Leg Warmers
Price: 21.00

Step into the coziest leg warmers with an undeniably Nordic flair. These leg warmers are the ultimate in cozy comfort, perfect for lounging around the house and made to wear with a dress, skirt, or over leggings for extra fall & winter weather coverage. 

  • 100% Wool
  • Swiss Azo free dyes
  • One size fits all

    care: Hand wash separately in cold water. Lay flat to dry or tumble dry on low heat

     

    Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
